entry.def: Tropical means belonging to or typical of the tropics.

example.ex: ...a plan to preserve the world's tropical forests.
example.tran: 保护世界热带雨林的计划

entry.tran: 湿热的;典型热带气候的
entry.def: Tropical weather is hot and damp weather that people believe to be typical of the tropics.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or situated in or characteristic of the tropics (the region on either side of the equator);
2. of or relating to the tropics, or either tropic;
3. characterized by or of the nature of a trope or tropes; changed from its literal sense
4. of weather or climate; hot and humid as in the tropics;
